meanings.definition: Drooping or nodding, as a plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The cernuous branches of the willow tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The flowers on the cernuous plant hung gracefully towards the ground.
meanings.sent3: The cernuous tree seemed to be bowing to the passing squirrels.
meanings.sent4: The cernuous vines embraced the old oak tree like a weeping shroud.
meanings.sent5: The cernuous leaves danced sadly as the autumn wind whispered through the forest.

meanings.sent1: The cernuous lamp post cast a long shadow on the deserted street.
meanings.sent2: The cernuous path led us down into the hidden valley below.
meanings.sent3: The cernuous flag fluttered sadly in the light breeze.
meanings.sent4: His cernuous posture made him appear smaller and less confident.
meanings.sent5: The cernuous roof of the old barn sagged under the weight of the snow.
